title: Ra (2014)
overview: Ra which means to Take away in Ancient Tolkappiyam , an apt title for the film which revolves around the lead character Ajay and his quest to find answers to the unsolved mystery in his life. Confused and baffled by the events happening around him, he is unsure if he is awake or still dreaming. With a deep intense meaning to all the occurrences around him, will he be able to break the shackles and come out victorious or succumb to the Devious foul play that is his mind itself is the Plot of the Movie .
storyline: Ra which means to Take away in Ancient Tolkappiyam , an apt title for the film which revolves around the lead character Ajay and his quest to find answers to the unsolved mystery in his life. Confused and baffled by the events happening around him, he is unsure if he is awake or still dreaming. With a deep intense meaning to all the occurrences around him, will he be able to break the shackles and come out victorious or succumb to the Devious foul play that is his mind itself is the Plot of the Movie .
plot: Renya, Ajay's wife, dies mysteriously on their very first day of marriage. Ajay starts solving the mystery and realizes that his enemy may be someone from another dimension, who would have accompanied him to his current world, due to an astral travel that had gone wrong. Whether Ajay would be able to crack the true intent behind his wife's murder is unveiled by the rest of the story.
synopsis: Abnormal death of Renya (Aditi Chengappa) which followed by paranormal consequences including red door, time loop, other dimensions etc., experienced by her husband ajay (ashraf) and how did ajay get to find solution for everything?
